title: "Advanced Bot tasting has been indefinitely delayed due to a catastrophic error"
body: The bots probably all got banned for toxicity because they learned **too** much from the community.

replies.body: Did you not know this was an April fools joke? Riot just changed the names of enemy teams to _bot and made them say the things in the beginning of the game. Also easy way to find out is that after game when you look at the stats the peoples names were there not _bot.
Oh the irony. Trying to expain the joke while not realising the guy himself was joking.
He's EUW, maybe english isn't his first language and he didnt catch the sarcasm? hopefully? Just trying to give him some kind of benefit of the doubt.

Agreed. Also he wasnt rude about it. He was trying to contribute information he thought op didnt know. People downvoting him are being toxic... On a thread joking about toxic levels of this community.
And the irony circle is compleet. Btw didnt downvote the guy. Downvoting is almost always just laziness instead of just formulating a counterpoint.
Are you a boards mod? This is Memes & Games, of course he's joking.

> [{quoted}](name=Elphege,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=zvdag5MA,comment-id=00000003,timestamp=2017-04-03T15:05:00.979+0000)
>
> Are you a boards mod?



https://s0.tcdn.co/9e4/a8c/9e4a8ccb-b9cf-30ce-93c0-373c13eb1d43/7.png?noredirect
No, if he was a boards mod he would have removed it and told him to go f*ck himself.
And he'd be right. Clearly this belongs to Report a Bug or Event Finder section.
https://encrypted-tbn2.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcSXg3ZbjbW0nBD7PdYUbSPOYn9xCcd5fIfSVXImdlWHKkeLCKZoHSsDeA
u (should) know it's a joke when rito disabled /allchat so toxicity cant rly be an issue
Holy fuck I'm actually retarded, I thought it was legit Bots... hahaha oh man I didn't take them seriously and kept feeding by accident ahahah... Goodness gracious.

The joke




















You
I don't really believe you deserved the downvotes here. You were just trying to help. :/
When the misspelling of the title is more of a joke than the joke itself
lol I hadn't noticed that.
Bots _are_ tasty, I must say.
does that mean bot testing is still available, you just cant get fed (tasting) off them anymore?????????????

> Bot tasting

Um

{{champion:117}} : That tasted purple
I bet 1$ the bots used **advanced** hacking  programs XD
Nah. They were scrpting.

Hah, Microsoft's bots know bett-

http://i.imgur.com/8UWOFwN.png?1

nvm

In one game, a bot actually called me the n-word. If i knew how to post screenshots, i would show it but i dont know how.

However, this was probably just a bug and instead of sending my friend's message as from him, it said it as from the bot. None of my other team mates saw the message, so I assume it was just a private message bug.
must've been your friend because all chat was disabled for this.
Yeah and they tasted so good....
Huh the top of the page is covered in +1s.  JINX IS BACK TO HER GRAFFITI TRICKS!
Tasty..
Tasting hehe
Why were people tasting me?

> Advanced Bot **tasting**

Rip {{champion:223}}

How long would it take to find a game if we had no bots? I cant see any point in bots except to decrease wait time or try and make a pc program as good as a human, if that's the case then its a strict for profit/volume motive and that half the population will respect. Why add something other then other humans?
Did I get memed on? I wrote testing. Riot?? RIOT!!
The best part about this is that there is an Intermediate Bot Tasting and Beginner Bot Tasting also.
I learned a fucking dictionary of words from this game...
